commands.name: Select the card above the current card
Select the card below the current card
Select the card to the left of the current card
Select the card to the right of the current card
Open the boards menu in the header
Put the cursor in the search box in the header
Open the date picker for a card
Open quick edit mode
commands.notes: If hovering over a card, pressing `E` will open quick edit mode, which lets you quickly edit the title and other card attributes.

commands.name: Close edit window
commands.notes: Pressing `Esc` will close an open dialog window or pop-over or cancel edits and comments you are composing.

commands.name: Open selected card
commands.notes: Pressing `Enter` will open the currently selected card. Pressing `SHIFT+Enter` while submitting a card will open it immediately after creating it.

commands.name: Open filter menu
commands.notes: Use `F` to open the card filter menu. The search by title input is automatically focused.

commands.name: Open available labels
commands.notes: Pressing `L` opens a pop-over of the available labels. Clicking a label will add or remove it from the card. Pressing a number key selects a label in that position.

commands.name: Add or remove members
commands.notes: Pressing `M` opens the add / remove members menu. Clicking a member’s avatar will assign or unassign that person.

commands.name: Add another card
commands.notes: Pressing `N` opens a pop-over that allows you to add a card after the currently selected card.

commands.name: Move a card to the adjacent left list
Move a card to the adjacent right list
Toggle the `cards assigned to me` filter
Subscription options for card
commands.notes: Pressing `S` will subscribe you to, or unsubscribe you from, a card. Subscribing to a card will give you notifications for most actions to that card.

commands.name: Assign (or unassign) yourself to a card
Edit card title
commands.notes: If viewing a card, pressing `T` will edit the title. If hovering over a card, pressing `T` will open the card and edit the title.

commands.name: Vote on card
commands.notes: Pressing `V` will add (or remove) your vote on a card if the Voting Power-Up is enabled.

commands.name: Collapse or expand the board menu
Autocomplete member name
commands.notes: (str "When writing a comment, you can type `@` plus a member’s name, username, or initials and get a list of matching members. You can navigate that list with the up and down arrows. Pressing enter or tab with a member selected will mention that user in the comment. The mentioned user will get a notification once submitted.\n")

commands.name: Autocomplete labels
commands.notes: When adding a new card, you can type `#` plus the label’s color or title and get a list of matching labels. You can use the up and down arrows to navigate the resulting list. Pressing enter or tab will add the label to the composed card. The labels will be added to the card when you submit.

commands.name: Autocomplete card position
commands.notes: When adding a new card, you can type `^` plus a list name or position in a list. You can also type `top` or `bottom` to add to the top or bottom of the current list. You can use the up and down arrows to navigate the resulting list. Pressing enter or tab will automatically change the position of the composed card.
